name: Pushover
description: G.I.Ant is extremely clever, and highly trained in tactical maneuvers. What's more, he is extraordinarily strong, and super smart. His latest mission is to gain access to the crazy world of Captain Rat's Treasure Caves. Straight forward, huh?...... NOT!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Athlon 64 or later
